meanings.definition: To give a new name to something.
meanings.sent1: I will rename my dog from Max to Buddy.
meanings.sent2: I need to rename the file to make it easier to find.
meanings.sent3: My cat asked me to rename her 'Princess Fluffy Paws'.
meanings.sent4: The town decided to rename the street after a famous poet.
meanings.sent5: After the wedding, the bride will rename herself with her husband's last name.

meanings.definition: To change the name of something.
meanings.sent1: Can you help me rename this document before sending it?
meanings.sent2: It is important to rename the project for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The computer got confused when I tried to rename the folder 'Nothing'.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to rename the painting to better reflect its theme.
meanings.sent5: She had to rename her business due to a trademark issue.
